answers.answer: Not an HIV concern in adults.
even though my stomach acid is reduced and thank you for answering
Your stomach acid has nothing to do with it.
so what kills it then please sorry for questions
1. You didn't drink enough breast milk for a long enough period to be a risk.2. Saliva contains over a dozen different enzymes and proteins that inhibits HIV transmission.

No it does not make a difference.
